titleStmt.title: The countrey lasse. To a daintie new note, which if you can hit, there's another tune will as well fit. To the tune of, The mother beguild daughter.
titleStmt.author: M. P. (Martin Parker), d. 1656?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the assignes of Thomas Symcocke,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by STC.
Verse: "Although I am a countrey lasse ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
